member.name: POLICY_DOMAIN_INFORMATION_CLASS
member.summary: The POLICY_DOMAIN_INFORMATION_CLASS enumeration defines the type of policy domain information.

member.name: POLICY_DOMAIN_INFORMATION_CLASS.PolicyDomainEfsInformation
member.summary: The information is for Encrypting File System.

member.name: POLICY_DOMAIN_INFORMATION_CLASS.PolicyDomainKerberosTicketInformation
member.summary: The information is for a Kerberos ticket.
